ideas.title: Effect of NYC Overdose Prevention Centers on Overdose Mortality
ideas.rationale: This is a methodological revision of apep_0136 that fixes fundamental SCM issues. The de-meaned approach addresses level mismatch appropriately. Results may be null but that is valuable scientific information.
ideas.concerns: Small sample (7 units), short post-treatment period (3 years), may lack power to detect effects.

metadata.note: This is a revision of apep_0136, not a new discovery. Rankings reflect appropriateness of methodological fix.
